ags:resource.dc:subject: ad & case
farmer field schools (FFS)
is extension
knowledge and infromation sharing
small holders
ags:resource.dc:creator: Waddington, Hugh

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: This report is based on systematic review of over 500 documents, and discusses, impact of the farmer field school, theory of change, targeting farmers, implementation, impact on participant farmers, and implications for policy, research and practice.
